title: The Mad Logophile: In Pursuit Of Words: Words From The World Of Politics
description: The Mad In Pursuit Of Words, Words From The World Of Politics. Do politics confuse you? Maybe it's only a matter of learning the jargon. This mini-book informs the reader about words used in politics, political writing and reporting, including slang and jargon. Add new words to your lexicon while learning about politics. You might still be confused, but it won't be because you don't understand what's being said.
author: The Mad Logophile
